ExtendedSection.Title: Reasons for using Eclipse with Gradle as preferred setup

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: Eclipse and Gradle is used by the OpenCms core developers. And the gradle projects with the OpenCms source are available at GitHub. Moreover, all OpenCms releases are available at MVNrepository. So if you write code depending on the OpenCms source, it's the easiest and most convenient way to stay with Gradle. And Eclipse? Well, it provides a good environment for Java programming and Gradle is integrated easily via a plugin.
